title: Understanding and Applying Cultural Influences in Online Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Basic understanding of online learning platforms and general awareness of cultural diversity
context.additional_context: A course to strengthen online education design and operational competencies in multicultural learning environments, developing culturally contextualized educational strategies through asynchronous discussions and self-reflection

learning_goals: Learners can explain the impact of their cultural background on online learning environments with three or more specific examples.
Learners can propose methods to apply theories of various cultural dimensions (e.g., power distance, individualism-collectivism) to online learning design.
Learners can practice and document in a self-reflection journal at least two feedback strategies that consider cultural differences in asynchronous discussion forums.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
